name: Cards Up! Merge Puzzle
description:
Merge 3 or more blocks with the same rank, complete quests and achieve the best score in each run!

Customize your colorful cards to merge them of various backgrounds.

The concept of the game is simple:
- Place cards by dragging them onto the board
- Match at least 3 cards with the same rank to combine them into one card with higher rank
- Beat your best score by merging as many cards as possible
- To achieve the best results use power-ups
- Complete quests to score new levels
- Unlock beautiful card styles!
- Enjoy endless fun!
